meanings.definition: A part or element of a larger whole
meanings.sent1: The different components of the car include the engine and the wheels.
meanings.sent2: She carefully assembled all the components of the puzzle to complete the picture.
meanings.sent3: The cake's components decided to have a party without the icing.
meanings.sent4: In the story, trust and honesty were the key components to their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The components of the machine hummed together in perfect harmony.

meanings.definition: Ingredients or parts that make up a whole
meanings.sent1: The components of the recipe were flour, sugar, and eggs.
meanings.sent2: All the components of the dish blended together to create a delicious flavor.
meanings.sent3: The components of the salad had a dance party in the bowl.
meanings.sent4: Laughter and love were the essential components of their family bond.
meanings.sent5: The components of the potion glowed mysteriously in the dark room.

meanings.definition: Constituent elements of a system or structure
meanings.sent1: The components of the computer system include the processor and the memory.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the components of a language is crucial for effective communication.
meanings.sent3: The components of the building decided to rearrange themselves for fun.
meanings.sent4: Patience and perseverance are key components in achieving success.
meanings.sent5: The components of the plan fell into place like a perfectly solved puzzle.
